snippet: The day before a European conference on the migrant crisis, NATO announced it would strengthen its presence in the territorial waters of Turkey and Greece.
abstract: NATO announces it will step up maritime efforts to stop smugglers of migrants in Aegean Sea; declaration comes day before conference where European Union leaders hope to urge Turkey to stem migrant flow that is threatening Greece and Continent's open border policy.
lead_paragraph: The day before a European conference on the migrant crisis, NATO announced it would strengthen its presence in the territorial waters of Turkey and Greece.

headline.main: NATO to Expand Patrols in Aegean Sea to Stop Human Traffickers
headline.print_headline: NATO Takes Fight to Human Traffickers in Aegean

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
